fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.heater

Interface HeaterSensorDataCI.HeaterSensorCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    HeaterSensorDataCI.HeaterSensorOfferedPullCI, HeaterSensorDataCI.HeaterSensorRequiredPullCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HeaterSensorDataConnector, HeaterSensorDataInboundPort, HeaterSensorDataOutboundPort
    Enclosing interface:
    HeaterSensorDataCI

    public static interface HeaterSensorDataCI.HeaterSensorCI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
    The component interface HeaterSensorCI declares the common services used in pull mode to get the sensor data from the heater.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants
